short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The fastest way for PlusNaija to get you notified for the latest Random Quotes updates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The fastest way to get notifications for the latest Quotes and Random quote updates.

This Google Chrome extension will let you know about the recent quote from Jim Bouton, Mark Twain, James Freeman Clarke, Raphael Ogazie, Chukwuemeks Ogazie, Raphael Toosweet and Others.

Features:
- Awesome quotes
- All updates are now fully automatic
- You can add to Favorites
- Flexible And Nice Design.
- You can copy Quotes
- Beautiful and usable news widget.
- Be in the know without a click.
- Non intrusive, won't bug you
